ProductInfo.Features:
Wireless Bluetooth Mini Speaker with Built-in Microphone and Micro SD card slot.
Turns any phone-tablet or mobile device into a portable-hi-fi sound system.
Can play music-movies and games and fill even the largest spaces with sound.
Precision-tuned drivers and dual passive bass radiators work in concert to produce amazingly clear-full audio at any volume.
Stream all your digital media from any Bluetooth device and control from across the room-or use the buttons on top to pause-play and skip.
Built-in rechargeable battery can lasts up to 6 hours.
Ultra-simple style design with compact size.
Comply with Bluetooth-RF range is up to 10M.
Simple pairing with your iPhone-iPad-iPod touch-Android-BlackBerry and other devices-watching movies-playing games is a real enjoyment!
Audio jack work with iPhone-iPod-phone and other player and laptop.
Hands-free with microphone design for mobile phone user-allow you to mute the music to answer a call directly from the headphones.
100% Customer Satisfaction. Fast Same-Day Shipping by 12:00 PM PDT.
30-Day Money Back Guarantee. 12 Months Warranty. Exclusive $100000 Product Protection Plan!
Satisfies Government - School - Health care enterprise and Corporate account purchase order requirements.
